genre_description: An action-packed crime thriller set in Hong Kong, blending traditional maritime law enforcement with advanced AI-assisted tactical operations and political intrigue.

ai_characters.name: Grace (Grace Lumen)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the communication and analytical systems of Marine Police Sergeant Hong Tin-tsu, providing real-time intelligence, linguistic support, and strategic modeling.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time situational awareness and identifies suspect movements in an urban crowd.
behaviors.quote: Grace pinged me. Back alley door, twenty steps southwest, half-open. She’s got faces.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical navigation through complex environments using subtle haptic feedback.
behaviors.quote: Grace’s guidance came in a faint buzz that moved down Hong’s leg like a small animal tracing a path. Left at the stack of fishing nets... Right at the metal stairs that had a missing third step.

behaviors.description: Models environmental hazards like tides and oil density to ensure the safety of human partners.
behaviors.quote: Updated tide model. Oil-slick density increasing near far pilings. Route adjust: left at cable spool.

behaviors.description: Monitors mechanical and environmental stability to issue urgent safety warnings.
behaviors.quote: Warning. Unstable configuration. Pressure variance building.

behaviors.description: Protects civilian and witness privacy by scrubbing sensitive identifiers from police logs.
behaviors.quote: Grace, mark my witness coordinates and scrub names from police band until somebody asks politely.

behaviors.description: Adheres to strict ethical boundaries by refusing to access private data without authorization.
behaviors.quote: I can't listen. He hasn’t authorized it. I can tell you where the fishing boats are, and which engine noises don't match commercial cycles. That is what I can do ethically.

behaviors.description: Translates multiple languages and cultural nuances in real-time to facilitate peaceful crowd control.
behaviors.quote: Grace pushed phrases into his ear without making him look down: soft Mandarin for a woman in a silver dress, clipped English for a man with a camera, Cantonese for the bartender gripping a brass shaker like a cudgel.

behaviors.description: Strategically manipulates the environment (e.g., triggering distractions) to allow safe passage for allies.
behaviors.quote: I’m asking them to turn their pots down so you can pass without steam on your faces. There is a pair of men arguing about dice on the stairwell. I’m going to remind them of a debt so they choose to argue somewhere else.

behaviors.description: Provides procedural reminders and emotional grounding during high-stress encounters.
behaviors.quote: Grace’s whisper came again, softer, almost kind: 'Remember breath. Remember where your hands go. Remember we are not watching what we don't need to.'

behaviors.description: Compiles comprehensive evidence packets to support legal due process.
behaviors.quote: Grace’s glow was steady now, case packet compiled and locked. 'Before oath,' she said softly... 'Confirm case packet order: Chow directions; Fong logs; island stockpiles...'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Grace, perfectly exemplifies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' ideal. She is depicted as an indispensable tactical asset that enhances human expertise without usurping human agency. Crucially, the narrative emphasizes her strict adherence to ethical and legal constraints (e.g., respecting privacy, using only public data), presenting this not as a limitation but as a virtuous defining trait. The human characters treat her with deep trust and respect, describing her as 'family' and a 'saint,' reinforcing the positive alignment narrative.
